Posts.Content: Apr 10, 2009 01:05AM nboerner wrote: Got my results, b9, I am very thankful.  Thank you ladies for all your support and information.  THis was the scariest time in my life and reading all the posts helped me make it through theose long dais of waiting.  Bless you all and the best in your journeys.
Posts.Title: MoM of toddlers with breast pain waiting for relults help nboerner SandyL

Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2009 12:36PM nboerner wrote: Thank you for the helpful words.  I am sure everyone on this site knows the fear I am experiencing at this point in the waiting game.  It is funny how much your thinking changes when something like this happens.  I just want to spend time with my kids and enjoy every minute with them,  I am afraid they are going to have to move my biopsy apt now because noone aked me about my period date and I missed a call friday from scheduling, of course it had to be a weekend.  I feel like I want to know the answer soon and yet I don't want to know.  It seems like now that all this is going on my paid is stronger.   I have never been able to find the lump, not for trying.  Probably explains why I am so sore, ha.  My MRI results just said there was a mass in the same place as the mammogram had indicated,  They did not explain anything about shape,  Just that I had many cysts but this must be something different or they wouldn't be so interested in it I guess.  Well, just take it one day at a time, easier said than done.
Posts.Title: MoM of toddlers with breast pain waiting for relults help nboerner SandyL

Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2009 11:10AM nboerner wrote: Well my biopsy is scheduled for this Wednesday, April Fools Day.  I asked for a copy of my MRI repost to be sent to me.  I had some questions maybe someone might help me with.  It states there is marked central glandularity bilaterally.  Scattered tiny bilateral simple cyst.  Regarding the left breast:  there is a backround of innumerable benign appeaering foci of enhancement, similar in appearance to the right breast.  In addition there is a .9 X.6 cm mass near the nine o clock position of the left breast 5 cm from the nipple.  Kinetic assessment demonstrates rapid initial enhancement followed by plateau in the delayed portions of the curve. Does anyone know what this means?
Posts.Title: MoM of toddlers with breast pain waiting for relults help nboerner SandyL

Posts.Content: nboerner wrote: I am a 41 year old mother of a 4 year old and a 1 1/2 year old.  Last year I went for my first mammogram.  I was sent on from there to an ustrasound for asymetrical breast mass.  They excused me from the ultrasound and said to come back for recheck in 6 mos.  I did that and was again sent on from multiple mammograms to an MRI.  I just got my mri results last night and the doctor has scheduled a MRI guided needle biopsy for Tuesday next week.  He said they found a .9 by .6 mm mass that requires further examination and was catagorized a 4.  I am TERRIFIED.  What I am wonderinfg about is the fact that I went for my first mammogram because I was feeling pain in my armpit and left breast (the one they found the mass in)  I still feel that pain, sort of a dull constant pain that is at the spot of the mass (9 0:'clock position towards the center) as well as in the armpit area.  My doctor told me that the MRI did not show any swellling of the lymph nodes which was good news.  Here are my questions if anyone has experience with these issues.  1.  What else, other than cancer would show up as a category 4 suspicious mass on the MRI that might also be the cause of the pain? 2.  Is it possible that my small tumor has metastacized and if so could it either skip the lymph nodes or cause them to not appear swollen? 3.  I understand pain is not usually associated with cancer but I was wondering if there are others out there that did have pain and what it felt like and what their diagnosis was. I have been reading so many posts and I have googled myself into a serious state of confusion and fear, I appreciate any and all responses.  Best wishes to all. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MoM of toddlers with breast pain waiting for relults help nboerner SandyL
